entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Fog at times early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then light snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023
